word_mean_info__list.difference: 指拥有某国国籍或有某地区合法身份的人，即公民。
指土生土长的本地居民。
指相对于军人或官员的平民百姓。
多指长期居住或暂时居住的民民，有时也指旅居者。
最普通用词，一般指常住居民。

word_group.brief_definition: 平民领袖；平民领导人；文职领导人

bilingual.source: The war inflict great suffering on the civilian population.
bilingual.target: 战争使平民遭受了巨大的痛苦。

bilingual.source: The civilian was caught in the crossfire during the conflict.
bilingual.target: 这名平民在冲突中被卷入了交火。

bilingual.source: The war led to widespread privation among the civilian population.
bilingual.target: 战争导致平民中普遍存在贫困。

bilingual.source: The civilian population was evacuated before the hurricane hit.
bilingual.target: 飓风来袭前，平民人口被疏散了。

bilingual.source: Many soldiers returned to civilian life after demobilization.
bilingual.target: 许多士兵在遣散后回到了平民生活。

bilingual.source: The conflict between warlords led to many civilian deaths.
bilingual.target: 军阀之间的冲突导致了许多平民的死亡。

bilingual.source: The government promised to protect every civilian in the region.
bilingual.target: 政府承诺保护该地区的每一位平民。

bilingual.source: After retiring from the army, he lived a quiet life as a civilian.
bilingual.target: 从军队退役后，他过上了平静的平民生活。

bilingual.source: The soldier was accused of wounding a civilian during the conflict.
bilingual.target: 这名士兵被指控在冲突中伤害了一名平民。

bilingual.source: The aid workers provided food and shelter to the displaced civilian.
bilingual.target: 救援人员为流离失所的平民提供了食物和住所。

yingyinNormal.en: A civilian harboring the Autobots has hacked into one of your mini-drones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一名帮助汽车人的平民骇进了你的迷你空拍机

yingyinNormal.en: So you're fine with civilian volunteers helping people die instead of doctors?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么你同意平民志愿者帮助人们自杀，但不同意医生这么做？

yingyinNormal.en: I can't sanction putting an untrained civilian in battle just for effect. This is not the Capitol.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我绝对不允许为了达到拍摄效果，就把一个未经训练的平民放在战场上，这里不是国会区。

yingyinNormal.en: And as our civilian and military personnel serve in the region, their safety and health will remain a top priority.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有我们在这一地区的平民和军事人员，他们的安全和健康将仍然是最优先的事情。

yingyinNormal.en: It's manned by both military and civilian personnel from District 2.
yingyinNormal.zh: 由第二区的军事和非军事人员共同操作。

yingyinNormal.en: All lines of communication have been compromised, both civilian and military. Shit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有通讯线路都被控制了，不论是军用还是民用。见鬼。

yingyinNormal.en: It's never been tested in the field. Labs, military bases, but not on civilian streets.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的原型从没实地演练过，都是在实验室而不是大街上。

yingyinNormal.en: It is a cutting edge high-tech firm, out of the Midwest awaiting imminent patent approval on the next generation of radar detectors that have both huge military and civilian applications now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一家高科技公司，就在中西部，安若坦实业就等着新一代的的雷达探测仪专利批复下来了，在军用及民用领域都会被广泛应用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Both men emphasized the dirt and exhaustion of war, the fragments of civilization that the soldiers shared with each other and the <highlight>civilians</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两个人都强调了战争的污浊和疲惫，士兵们之间以及与平民之间分享的文明碎片。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A man described as a "non-worker <highlight>civilian</highlight>" was buried up to his waist in the basement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据悉，一名“非工人”男子在地下室被废墟埋至腰部。

examination_example.sentence: What does the report say about the "non-worker <highlight>civilian</highlight>"?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 报告对“非工人平民”有何看法？

examination_example.sentence: Advise Tunisian <highlight>civilians</highlight> on how to take safety precautions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就如何采取安全预防措施向突尼斯平民提供建议。
